title: SINC Partners is a service incubation company
body: Connecting experts in product development and growth marketing willing to offer their services to amazing startups in exchange for minute equity (usually 0.5% to 2%).

title: Come with an idea, leave with a company.
body: You, alongside seasoned service partners and investors, expedite the growth and market entry of your startup.

title: We are big on these 3 things;
body: ✓ Service Incubation & Ecosystem Advocacy ✓ Building SAAS & Marketing Tech Platforms ✓ Institutional Innovations
